scripts.install: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/install.sh; else bin/install.sh; fi
scripts.test: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/test.sh; else bin/test.sh; fi
scripts.coverage: if [ -f '.travis.yml' ]; then test/bin/coverage.sh; else bin/coverage.sh; fi
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:modules
